title: Segmented control: Icons
code:
<gds-segmented-control width="280px" value='2' size="small">
  <gds-segment value="1">
    <gds-flex align-items="center" gap="s">
      <gds-icon-square-grid-circle size="s"></gds-icon-square-grid-circle>
      Item 1
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="1">
    <gds-flex align-items="center" gap="s">
      <gds-icon-devices size="s"></gds-icon-devices>
      Item 2
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="1">
    <gds-flex align-items="center" gap="s">
      <gds-icon-brand-green size="s"></gds-icon-brand-green>
      Item 3
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-segment>
</gds-segmented-control>
